channel.title: Kalphite queen
channel.description:
Hello,
I just wondered if anybody knew how to make it so when one monster dies another one will spawm in its place.
Say like the kq.You kill it and then its second form will appear.
Any help would be apreciated thank you.

item.title: Kalphite queen
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Yh but theres more to it than that lol , have any idea ?

What i mean is i want another npc to spawm in the same spot once i have killed the other one.

Read full topic

item.title: Kalphite queen
item.dc:creator: @teh_war_of_noobs teh war of noobs
item.description:
@teh_war_of_noobs wrote:

you have to put it in the Autospawn cfg. so it will respawn everytime u kill it.

Read full topic
